entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
